import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import 'font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css'; import appstore from '../../images/app-store-badge.png'; import googleplay from '../../images/google-play-badge.png'; class Footer extends React.Component { render() { return (
